mng: to cut down, to fell, to dispatch an expedition against, to attack, to boast, Taiwan pr. [fa1]

exm.mng: the Northern Expedition, the Nationalists' campaign of 1926-1927 under Chiang Kaishek against the Northern Warlords
to suppress by armed force, to send a punitive expedition against, to crusade against
to go on or send a punitive expedition
to denude, illegal logging, forest clearance
